text: Ramsewak Shankar (born November 6, 1937) is a Surinamese politician. He was the 4th President of Suriname from 1988 to 1990. His government was overthrown by DÃ©si Bouterse leading a bloodless military coup. Shankar was Agriculture & Fisheries Minister from 1969 to 1971. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Suriname
title: Ramsewak Shankar
